entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 10:03 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:03 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 10:03 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
